rows.label: bf04040100_0010
rows.name:
I'm very sorry about Hikari-chan.
She said very hurtful things.

rows.label: bf04040100_0020
rows.name:
You have to understand, Hikari-chan came out
because she wanted to protect you.

rows.label: bf04040100_0030
rows.name:
She broke her own seal for you,
even used her power as the Holy Grail...

rows.label: bf04040100_0032
rows.name:
The flame powers I use are
just a shadow of her strength.

rows.label: bf04040100_0034
rows.name:
Droplets of excess energy,
trickling through the seal...

rows.label: bf04040100_0040
rows.name:
Don't worry about it.
It's true that I wasn't strong enough.

rows.label: bf04040100_0050
rows.name: More than that...

rows.label: bf04040100_0060
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: bf04040100_0070
rows.name: I'm really glad you told us the truth.

rows.label: bf04040100_0080
rows.name:
Also, thank you!
For protecting everyone, I mean.

rows.label: bf04040100_0090
rows.name: Protecting? Me?

rows.label: bf04040100_0100
rows.name:
Your powers are incredible.
I could feel the truth behind the legends!

rows.label: bf04040100_0110
rows.name: I'm sorry... I...

rows.label: bf04040100_0120
rows.name: You apologize a lot, you know that?

rows.label: bf04040100_0130
rows.name: I guess you still feel guilty...

rows.label: bf04040100_0135
rows.name: about the Holy Grail's power, right?

rows.label: bf04040100_0140
rows.name:
But I...don't want you to have to
apologize any more.

rows.label: bf04040100_0150
rows.name: I hope I can help you not make that sad face anymore.

rows.label: bf04040100_0160
rows.name: No, I know I can!

rows.label: bf04040100_0170
rows.name: Rex, I-

rows.label: bf04040100_0180
rows.name: Power takes the shape of it's wielder...

rows.label: bf04040100_0185
rows.name: That's what Vandham-san said.

rows.label: bf04040100_0190
rows.name: That's why your power is the power to protect.

rows.label: bf04040100_0195
rows.name: The power to keep everyone safe and smiling.

rows.label: bf04040100_0200
rows.name:
I want to do the same. I'm gonna be the kind
of Driver who can protect you in turn. I promise!

rows.label: bf04040100_0210
rows.name: Make a girl cry? That's not gonna fly.

rows.label: bf04040100_0215
rows.name: Make a girl smile? You pass the trial!

rows.label: bf04040100_0220
rows.name:
That's the third rule of
the Salvager Code! Yeah?

rows.label: bf04040100_0230
rows.name:
Boss! Can you help Tora
with repairing of Hana, please?

rows.label: bf04040100_0240
rows.name: Okay! I'll be right there!

rows.label: bf04040100_0250
rows.name: Oh yeah - what's for dinner tonight?

rows.label: bf04040100_0260
rows.name: How does Meatball Pot-au-Feu sound?

rows.label: bf04040100_0270
rows.name: Delicious! Mm, I can't wait!

rows.label: bf04040100_0280
rows.name:
That's my Rex.
Turns sadness into power for tomorrow.

rows.label: bf04040100_0290
rows.name:
...Reminds you of Adel,
don't you think?
